message: Let's get this done quickly. A 70/30 split seems fair to me.
Your offer was a bit too one-sided Alice. How about a 60/40 split?
Bob, time is running out. I'm willing to compromise, let's settle for 65/35.
We're getting close, Alice. 55/45 seems like a reasonable compromise.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My 65/35 offer was generous, but I'll come down to 60/40. Take it or leave it - we're both losing out with every passing round.
